reports.title: KnetMiner
reports.query:
**This is KnetMiner dashboard!** 

[KnetMiner](https://knetminer.com/) (Knowledge Network Miner) is an open-source software platform that offers access to large knowledge networks about genes, traits, diseases and more biological entities.

This tab contains general reports about the nodes and edges of the Poaceae species.

reports.title: Total Node Count
reports.query:
Match (n)
RETURN COUNT(n) as Node_count

reports.title: Total Edge Count
reports.query:
Match (n)-[r]->()
RETURN COUNT(r) as Edge_count

reports.title: Node types and counts
reports.query:
MATCH (n)
UNWIND LABELS(n) as label
WITH label
RETURN DISTINCT label as Node_Types, count(label) as Node_count
ORDER BY Node_count DESC

//MATCH (n)
//RETURN distinct labels(n) as Node_Types, count (n) as Node_count

reports.title: Edge types and counts
reports.query:
MATCH ()-[r]->()
RETURN distinct type(r) as Edge_Types, count(r) as Edge_count
ORDER BY Edge_count DESC

reports.title: Edges where type is not 'dataSource'
reports.query:
MATCH ()-[r]->()
WHERE type(r) <> 'dataSource'
RETURN distinct type(r) as Edge_Types, count(r) as Edge_count
ORDER BY Edge_count DESC

reports.title: Edges where type is not dataSource, identifier
reports.query:
MATCH ()-[r]->()
WHERE NOT (type(r) IN ['dataSource', 'identifier'])
RETURN distinct type(r) as Edge_Types, count(r) as Edge_count
ORDER BY Edge_count DESC

reports.title: Breakdown of Datasources and counts
reports.query:
MATCH (n:DataSource)
RETURN distinct n.identifier as Data_Source, count(n) as Node_Count
ORDER BY Node_Count DESC

reports.title: Schema
reports.query: CALL db.schema.visualization

reports.title: number of dataSource relations per DataSource
reports.query:
MATCH (n:DataSource)-[r:dataSource]-()
RETURN distinct n.identifier as Data_Source, count(r) as DataSource_relations_count
ORDER BY DataSource_relations_count DESC

reports.title: Number of DataSource nodes with dataSource relations vs not
reports.query:
MATCH (n:DataSource)
RETURN EXISTS((n)<-[:dataSource]-()) AS is_dataSource_present, count(*) AS count

reports.title: DataSource.label
reports.query:
MATCH (n:DataSource)
RETURN distinct n.label as Data_Source, count(n) as Node_Count
ORDER BY Node_Count DESC

reports.title: number of Genes per Tax ID
reports.query:
MATCH (g:Gene)
RETURN distinct g.TAXID as TAXID, count (g) as Genes_count
ORDER BY Genes_count DESC

reports.title: number of Proteins per TAXID
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Protein)
RETURN distinct p.TAXID as TAXID, count (p) as Protein_count
ORDER BY Protein_count DESC

reports.title: TAXID count
reports.query:
MATCH (g)
WHERE g:Gene OR g:Protein
WITH distinct labels(g) as Labs, count(g.TAXID) as total_TAXID_count, count(distinct g.TAXID) as distinct_TAXID_count
UNWIND Labs as Labels
WITH Labels, total_TAXID_count, distinct_TAXID_count
WHERE Labels IN ['Gene', 'Protein']
RETURN Labels, total_TAXID_count, distinct_TAXID_count

reports.title: number of Genes/Proteins per TAXID
number of Gene-Protein relationships per Gene TAXID
reports.query:
MATCH (g:Gene)-[r:enc]->(:Protein)
RETURN distinct g.TAXID as Gene_TAXID, count (r) as Gene_Protein_relationship_count
ORDER BY Gene_Protein_relationship_count DESC

reports.title: Count Protein-[ortho]-Protein relationships for pairs of TAXIDs
reports.query:
MATCH (protein1:Protein)-[r2:ortho]->(protein2:Protein)
RETURN protein1.TAXID, protein2.TAXID, COUNT(*) as homology_relation_count
ORDER BY homology_relation_count DESC

reports.title: number of homology (ortho/orthologue) relationships
reports.query: MATCH ()-[r:ortho]->() RETURN count(r)

reports.title: number of Gene out degree
reports.query:
MATCH (n:Gene)
RETURN size((n)-->()) AS Gene_Out_Degree, Count(*) AS Count_Out_Degree
ORDER BY Gene_Out_Degree

reports.title: number of Gene in degree
reports.query:
MATCH (n:Gene)
RETURN size((n)<--()) AS Gene_In_Degree, Count(*) AS Count_In_Degree
ORDER BY Gene_In_Degree

reports.title: number of Proteins out degree
reports.query:
MATCH (n:Protein)
RETURN size((n)-->()) AS Protein_Out_Degree, Count(*) AS Count_Out_Degree
ORDER BY Protein_Out_Degree

reports.title: number of Proteins in degree
reports.query:
MATCH (n:Protein)
RETURN size((n)<--()) AS Protein_In_Degree, Count(*) AS Count_In_Degree
ORDER BY Protein_In_Degree

reports.title: Number of genes with gene name (preferred vs not)
reports.query:
MATCH (n:Gene)
RETURN EXISTS(n.prefName) AS is_prefName_present, count(*) AS count

reports.title: number of Trait nodes degree
reports.query:
MATCH (n:Trait)
RETURN SIZE((n)--()) AS Degree, Count(*) AS Nodes_Count
ORDER BY Degree

reports.title: Traits with least links
reports.query:
MATCH (n:Trait)
WITH n, SIZE((n)--()) AS Degree
WITH min(Degree) as min_Degree
MATCH (n:Trait)
WHERE SIZE((n)--()) = min_Degree
RETURN n.prefName as Traits_with_least_links

reports.title: Traits with most links
reports.query:
MATCH (n:Trait)
WITH n, SIZE((n)--()) AS Degree
WITH max(Degree) as max_Degree
MATCH (n:Trait)
WHERE SIZE((n)--()) = max_Degree
RETURN n.prefName as Traits_with_most_links

reports.title: Choose Trait Name
reports.query:
MATCH (n:`Trait`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`prefName`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`prefName` as value ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 5

reports.title: Genes linked to the chosen Trait
reports.query:
MATCH p=(t:Trait)--(g:Gene)
WHERE t.prefName = $neodash_trait_prefname
RETURN p

reports.title: number of Gene-[cooc_wi]-Trait relations
reports.query:
MATCH p=(:Gene)-[:cooc_wi]-(:Trait)
RETURN count(p)

reports.title: Edge types and counts for Trait nodes
reports.query:
MATCH (n:Trait)-[r]-()
RETURN distinct type(r) as Edge_Types, count(r) as Edge_count
ORDER BY Edge_count DESC

reports.title: Number of Trait nodes with "cooccurs_with" relations vs not
reports.query:
MATCH (n:Trait)
RETURN EXISTS((:Gene)-[:cooc_wi]-(n)) AS is_cooccurs_with_present, count(*) AS count

reports.title: Trait Pathways (starting with the chosen gene TAX ID)
reports.query:
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r:cooc_wi] - (n:Trait)
WHERE m.TAXID = $neodash_gene_taxid
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:cooc_wi] - (:Trait)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r1:has_mutant] -> (n1:SNP) - [r2:associated_with] -> (n2:Phenotype) - [r3:part_of] -> (n3:Trait)
WHERE m.TAXID = $neodash_gene_taxid
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:has_mutant] -> (:SNP) - [:associated_with] -> (:Phenotype) - [:part_of] -> (:Trait)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r1:has_variation] -> (n1:SNP) - [r2:associated_with] -> (n2:Phenotype) - [r3:part_of] -> (n3:Trait)
WHERE m.TAXID = $neodash_gene_taxid
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:has_variation] -> (:SNP) - [:associated_with] -> (:Phenotype) - [:part_of] -> (:Trait)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r1:homoeolog] - (n1:Gene) - [r2:cooc_wi] - (n2:Trait)
WHERE m.TAXID = $neodash_gene_taxid
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:homoeolog] - (:Gene) - [:cooc_wi] - (:Trait)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r1:regulates] - (n1:Gene) - [r2:cooc_wi] - (n2:Trait)
WHERE m.TAXID = $neodash_gene_taxid
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:regulates] - (:Gene) - [:cooc_wi] - (:Trait)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r1:genetic] - (n1:Gene) - [r2:cooc_wi] - (n2:Trait)
WHERE m.TAXID = $neodash_gene_taxid
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:genetic] - (:Gene) - [:cooc_wi] - (:Trait)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r1:physical] - (n1:Gene) - [r2:cooc_wi] - (n2:Trait)
WHERE m.TAXID = $neodash_gene_taxid
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:physical] - (:Gene) - [:cooc_wi] - (:Trait)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r1:homoeolog] - (n1:Gene) - [r2:has_mutant] -> (n2:SNP) - [r3:associated_with] -> (n3:Phenotype) - [r4:part_of] -> (n4:Trait)
WHERE m.TAXID = $neodash_gene_taxid
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:homoeolog] - (:Gene) - [:has_mutant] -> (:SNP) - [:associated_with] -> (:Phenotype) - [:part_of] -> (:Trait)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r1:homoeolog] - (n1:Gene) - [r2:has_variation] -> (n2:SNP) - [r3:associated_with] -> (n3:Phenotype) - [r4:part_of] -> (n4:Trait)
WHERE m.TAXID = $neodash_gene_taxid
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:homoeolog] - (:Gene) - [:has_variation] -> (:SNP) - [:associated_with] -> (:Phenotype) - [:part_of] -> (:Trait)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r1:regulates] - (n1:Gene) - [r2:has_mutant] -> (n2:SNP) - [r3:associated_with] -> (n3:Phenotype) - [r4:part_of] -> (n4:Trait)
WHERE m.TAXID = $neodash_gene_taxid
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:regulates] - (:Gene) - [:has_mutant] -> (:SNP) - [:associated_with] -> (:Phenotype) - [:part_of] -> (:Trait)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r1:regulates] - (n1:Gene) - [r2:has_variation] -> (n2:SNP) - [r3:associated_with] -> (n3:Phenotype) - [r4:part_of] -> (n4:Trait)
WHERE m.TAXID = $neodash_gene_taxid
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:regulates] - (:Gene) - [:has_variation] -> (:SNP) - [:associated_with] -> (:Phenotype) - [:part_of] -> (:Trait)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r1:genetic] - (n1:Gene) - [r2:has_mutant] -> (n2:SNP) - [r3:associated_with] -> (n3:Phenotype) - [r4:part_of] -> (n4:Trait)
WHERE m.TAXID = $neodash_gene_taxid
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:genetic] - (:Gene) - [:has_mutant] -> (:SNP) - [:associated_with] -> (:Phenotype) - [:part_of] -> (:Trait)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r1:genetic] - (n1:Gene) - [r2:has_variation] -> (n2:SNP) - [r3:associated_with] -> (n3:Phenotype) - [r4:part_of] -> (n4:Trait)
WHERE m.TAXID = $neodash_gene_taxid
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:genetic] - (:Gene) - [:has_variation] -> (:SNP) - [:associated_with] -> (:Phenotype) - [:part_of] -> (:Trait)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r1:physical] - (n1:Gene) - [r2:has_mutant] -> (n2:SNP) - [r3:associated_with] -> (n3:Phenotype) - [r4:part_of] -> (n4:Trait)
WHERE m.TAXID = $neodash_gene_taxid
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:physical] - (:Gene) - [:has_mutant] -> (:SNP) - [:associated_with] -> (:Phenotype) - [:part_of] -> (:Trait)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r1:physical] - (n1:Gene) - [r2:has_variation] -> (n2:SNP) - [r3:associated_with] -> (n3:Phenotype) - [r4:part_of] -> (n4:Trait)
WHERE m.TAXID = $neodash_gene_taxid
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:physical] - (:Gene) - [:has_variation] -> (:SNP) - [:associated_with] -> (:Phenotype) - [:part_of] -> (:Trait)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (gene_1:Gene) - [enc_1_10_d:enc] -> (protein_10:Protein) - [rel_10_10:h_s_s] - (protein_10b:Protein) - [cooc_wi_10_21:cooc_wi] - (trait_21:Trait)
WHERE gene_1.TAXID = $neodash_gene_taxid
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:enc] -> (:Protein) - [:h_s_s] - (:Protein) - [:cooc_wi] - (:Trait)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (gene_1:Gene) - [enc_1_10_d:enc] -> (protein_10:Protein) - [rel_10_10:ortho] - (protein_10b:Protein) - [cooc_wi_10_21:cooc_wi] - (trait_21:Trait)
WHERE gene_1.TAXID = $neodash_gene_taxid
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:enc] -> (:Protein) - [:ortho] - (:Protein) - [:cooc_wi] - (:Trait)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (gene_1:Gene) - [enc_1_10_d:enc] -> (protein_10:Protein) - [rel_10_10:xref] - (protein_10b:Protein) - [cooc_wi_10_21:cooc_wi] - (trait_21:Trait)
WHERE gene_1.TAXID = $neodash_gene_taxid
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:enc] -> (:Protein) - [:xref] - (:Protein) - [:cooc_wi] - (:Trait)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (gene_1:Gene) - [enc_1_10_d:enc] -> (protein_10:Protein) - [rel_10_10:ortho] - (protein_10b:Protein) <- [enc_10_9_d:enc] - (gene_9:Gene) - [has_variation_9_20_d:has_variation] -> (sNP_20:SNP) - [associated_with_20_211_d:associated_with] -> (pheno:Phenotype) - [part_of_211_21:part_of] - (trait_21:Trait)
WHERE gene_1.TAXID = $neodash_gene_taxid
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:enc] -> (:Protein) - [:ortho] - (:Protein) <- [:enc] - (:Gene) - [:has_variation] -> (:SNP) - [:associated_with] -> (:Phenotype) - [:part_of] - (:Trait)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (gene_1:Gene) - [enc_1_10_d:enc] -> (protein_10:Protein) - [rel_10_10:ortho] - (protein_10b:Protein) <- [enc_10_9_d:enc] - (gene_9:Gene) - [cooc_wi_9_21:cooc_wi] - (trait_21:Trait)
WHERE gene_1.TAXID = $neodash_gene_taxid
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:enc] -> (:Protein) - [:ortho] - (:Protein) <- [:enc] - (:Gene) - [:cooc_wi] - (:Trait)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (gene_1:Gene) - [enc_1_10_d:enc] -> (protein_10:Protein) - [rel_10_10:ortho] - (protein_10b:Protein) <- [enc_10_9_d:enc] - (gene_9:Gene) - [rel_9_9_2:genetic] - (gene_9b:Gene) - [has_variation_9_20_d:has_variation] -> (sNP_20:SNP) - [associated_with_20_211_d:associated_with] -> (pheno:Phenotype) - [part_of_211_21:part_of] - (trait_21:Trait)
WHERE gene_1.TAXID = $neodash_gene_taxid
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(Gene) - [enc] -> (Protein) - [ortho] - (Protein) <- [enc] - (Gene) - [genetic] - (Gene) - [has_variation] -> (SNP) - [associated_with] -> (Phenotype) - [part_of] - (Trait)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (gene_1:Gene) - [enc_1_10_d:enc] -> (protein_10:Protein) - [rel_10_10:ortho] - (protein_10b:Protein) <- [enc_10_9_d:enc] - (gene_9:Gene) - [rel_9_9_2:physical] - (gene_9b:Gene) - [has_variation_9_20_d:has_variation] -> (sNP_20:SNP) - [associated_with_20_211_d:associated_with] -> (pheno:Phenotype) - [part_of_211_21:part_of] - (trait_21:Trait)
WHERE gene_1.TAXID = $neodash_gene_taxid
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(Gene) - [enc] -> (Protein) - [ortho] - (Protein) <- [enc] - (Gene) - [physical] - (Gene) - [has_variation] -> (SNP) - [associated_with] -> (Phenotype) - [part_of] - (Trait)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (gene_1:Gene) - [enc_1_10_d:enc] -> (protein_10:Protein) - [rel_10_10:ortho] - (protein_10b:Protein) <- [enc_10_9_d:enc] - (gene_9:Gene) - [rel_9_9_2:genetic] - (gene_9b:Gene) - [cooc_wi_9_21:cooc_wi] - (trait_21:Trait)
WHERE gene_1.TAXID = $neodash_gene_taxid
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:enc] -> (:Protein) - [:ortho] - (:Protein) <- [:enc] - (:Gene) - [:genetic] - (:Gene) - [:cooc_wi] - (:Trait)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (gene_1:Gene) - [enc_1_10_d:enc] -> (protein_10:Protein) - [rel_10_10:ortho] - (protein_10b:Protein) <- [enc_10_9_d:enc] - (gene_9:Gene) - [rel_9_9_2:physical] - (gene_9b:Gene) - [cooc_wi_9_21:cooc_wi] - (trait_21:Trait)
WHERE gene_1.TAXID = $neodash_gene_taxid
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:enc] -> (:Protein) - [:ortho] - (:Protein) <- [:enc] - (:Gene) - [:physical] - (:Gene) - [:cooc_wi] - (:Trait)" AS pathway, count

reports.title: Choose Gene TAX ID
reports.query:
MATCH (n:`Gene`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`TAXID`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`TAXID` as value ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 5

reports.title: Gene TAX IDs
reports.query:
Tax ID	|	Tax Name

3702	|	Arabidopsis thaliana

4513	|	Hordeum vulgare (barley)

15368	|	Brachypodium distachyon (brome)

4565	|	Triticum aestivum (wheat)

4577	|	Zea mays (maize)

4530	|	Oryza sativa (rice)

reports.title: Count of pub_in relations per TAXID
reports.query:
MATCH (n)-[r:pub_in]-()
RETURN distinct n.TAXID as TAXID, count(r) as pub_in_Edge_count
ORDER BY pub_in_Edge_count DESC

reports.title: Count of occ_in relations per TAXID
reports.query:
MATCH (n)-[r:occ_in]-()
RETURN distinct n.TAXID as TAXID, count(r) as occ_in_Edge_count
ORDER BY occ_in_Edge_count DESC

reports.title: Summary of Publication nodes and properties
reports.query:
MATCH (n:Publication)
RETURN n.prefName as PMID, n.JOURNAL_REF as Journal_Refrence, n.AbstractHeader as Abstarct_Header, n.AUTHORS as Authors, n.YEAR as Year
LIMIT 25

reports.title: Number of Publications Per Journal
reports.query:
MATCH (n:Publication)
RETURN distinct n.JOURNAL_REF as Journal_Refrence, count (n) as Publications_count
ORDER BY Publications_count DESC

reports.title: Number of Publications per Year
reports.query:
MATCH (n:Publication)
RETURN toInteger(n.YEAR) as Year, COUNT(*) as Total
ORDER BY Year

reports.title: occurs_in relations
reports.query: MATCH p=()-[r:occ_in]->() RETURN p LIMIT 10

reports.title: cooccurs_with relations
reports.query: MATCH p=()-[r:cooc_wi]->() RETURN p LIMIT 25

reports.title: dataSource relations
reports.query: MATCH p=()-[r:dataSource]->() RETURN p LIMIT 25

reports.title: number of Gene-[cooc_wi]-Trait relations
reports.query:
MATCH p=(:Gene)-[:cooc_wi]-(:Trait)
RETURN count(p)

reports.title: Number of Co-Occurring Citations/Publications (for cooccurs_with relation)
reports.query:
MATCH ()-[r:cooc_wi]->()
RETURN toFloat(r.CoCitNum) as CoCitNum, COUNT(*) as Total
ORDER BY CoCitNum

reports.title: Number of Co-Occurring Sentences (for cooccurs_with relation)
reports.query:
MATCH ()-[r:cooc_wi]->()
RETURN toFloat(r.CoSenNum) as CoSenNum, COUNT(*) as Total
ORDER BY CoSenNum

reports.title: Inner product of TFIDF
reports.query:
MATCH ()-[r:cooc_wi]->()
RETURN toFloat(r.IP_TFIDF) as IP_TFIDF, COUNT(*) as Total
ORDER BY IP_TFIDF

reports.title: Maximum of TFIDF
reports.query:
MATCH ()-[r:cooc_wi]->()
RETURN toFloat(r.MAX_TFIDF) as MAX_TFIDF, COUNT(*) as Total
//RETURN r.MAX_TFIDF as MAX_TFIDF, COUNT(*) as Total
ORDER BY MAX_TFIDF

reports.title: "CORE SPECIES" Cypher pathways used in KnetMiner search
reports.query:
// gene-[..]
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r:enc] -> (n:Protein)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:enc] -> (:Protein)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r:homoeolog|regulates|genetic|physical] - (n:Gene)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:homoeolog|regulates|genetic|physical] - (:Gene)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r:pub_in] -> (n:Publication)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:pub_in] -> (:Publication)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r:occ_in] -> (n:Publication)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN  "(:Gene) - [:occ_in] -> (:Publication)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r:cooc_wi] - (n:Trait)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:cooc_wi] - (:Trait)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r:has_function] -> (n:MolFunc)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:has_function] -> (:MolFunc)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r:located_in] -> (n:CelComp)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:located_in] -> (:CelComp)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r:participates_in] -> (n:BioProc)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:participates_in] -> (:BioProc)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r:has_observ_pheno] -> (n:Phenotype)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:has_observ_pheno] -> (:Phenotype)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r:part_of] -> (n:Path)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:part_of] -> (:Path)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r:inv_in] -> (n:Reaction)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:inv_in] -> (:Reaction)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r1:has_mutant|has_variation] -> (n1:SNP) - [r2:associated_with] -> (n2:Phenotype)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:has_mutant|has_variation] -> (:SNP) - [:associated_with] -> (:Phenotype)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r1:has_mutant|has_variation] -> (n1:SNP) - [r2:associated_with] -> (n2:Phenotype) - [r3:part_of] -> (n3:Trait)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:has_mutant|has_variation] -> (:SNP) - [:associated_with] -> (:Phenotype) - [:part_of] -> (:Trait)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r1:has_mutant|has_variation] -> (n1:SNP) - [r2:associated_with] -> (n2:Phenotype) - [r3:pub_in] -> (n3:Publication)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:has_mutant|has_variation] -> (:SNP) - [:associated_with] -> (:Phenotype) - [:pub_in] -> (:Publication)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r1:has_mutant|has_variation] -> (n1:SNP) - [r2:leads_to] -> (n2:SNPEffect)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:has_mutant|has_variation] -> (:SNP) - [:leads_to] -> (:SNPEffect)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r1:part_of] -> (n1:CoExpCluster) - [r2:part_of] -> (n2:CoExpStudy)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:part_of] -> (:CoExpCluster) - [:part_of] -> (:CoExpStudy)" AS pathway, count

//add pvalue filter to reduce hits in gene-cluster-GO/PO
UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r1:part_of] -> (n1:CoExpCluster) - [r2:enriched_for] -> (n2:BioProc)
WHERE toFloat(r2.p_adjust)<1E-10
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:part_of] -> (:CoExpCluster) - [:enriched_for] -> (:BioProc)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r1:part_of] -> (n1:CoExpCluster) - [r2:enriched_for] -> (n2:PlantOntologyTerm)
WHERE toFloat(r2.over_represented_padj)<1E-3
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:part_of] -> (:CoExpCluster) - [:enriched_for] -> (:PlantOntologyTerm)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r:differentially_expressed] -> (n:DGES)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:differentially_expressed] -> (:DGES)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r1:differentially_expressed] -> (n1:DGES) - [r2:enriched_for] -> (n2:BioProc)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:differentially_expressed] -> (:DGES) - [:enriched_for] -> (:BioProc)" AS pathway, count

// gene-gene-[..]
UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r1:homoeolog|regulates|genetic|physical] - (n1:Gene) - [r2:pub_in] -> (n2:Publication)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:homoeolog|regulates|genetic|physical] - (:Gene) - [:pub_in] -> (:Publication)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r1:homoeolog|regulates|genetic|physical] - (n1:Gene) - [r2:occ_in] -> (n2:Publication)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:homoeolog|regulates|genetic|physical] - (:Gene) - [:occ_in] -> (:Publication)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r1:homoeolog|regulates|genetic|physical] - (n1:Gene) - [r2:cooc_wi] - (n2:Trait)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:homoeolog|regulates|genetic|physical] - (:Gene) - [:cooc_wi] - (:Trait)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r1:homoeolog|regulates|genetic|physical] - (n1:Gene) - [r2:has_function] -> (n2:MolFunc)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:homoeolog|regulates|genetic|physical] - (:Gene) - [:has_function] -> (:MolFunc)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r1:homoeolog|regulates|genetic|physical] - (n1:Gene) - [r2:located_in] -> (n2:CelComp)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:homoeolog|regulates|genetic|physical] - (:Gene) - [:located_in] -> (:CelComp)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r1:homoeolog|regulates|genetic|physical] - (n1:Gene) - [r2:participates_in] -> (n2:BioProc)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:homoeolog|regulates|genetic|physical] - (:Gene) - [:participates_in] -> (:BioProc)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r1:homoeolog|regulates|genetic|physical] - (n1:Gene) - [r2:has_observ_pheno] -> (n2:Phenotype)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:homoeolog|regulates|genetic|physical] - (:Gene) - [:has_observ_pheno] -> (:Phenotype)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r1:homoeolog|regulates|genetic|physical] - (n1:Gene) - [r2:part_of] -> (n2:Path)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:homoeolog|regulates|genetic|physical] - (:Gene) - [:part_of] -> (:Path)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r1:homoeolog|regulates|genetic|physical] - (n1:Gene) - [r2:inv_in] -> (n2:Reaction)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:homoeolog|regulates|genetic|physical] - (:Gene) - [:inv_in] -> (:Reaction)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r1:homoeolog|regulates|genetic|physical] - (n1:Gene) - [r2:has_mutant|has_variation] -> (n2:SNP) - [r3:associated_with] -> (n3:Phenotype)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:homoeolog|regulates|genetic|physical] - (:Gene) - [:has_mutant|has_variation] -> (:SNP) - [:associated_with] -> (:Phenotype)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r1:homoeolog|regulates|genetic|physical] - (n1:Gene) - [r2:has_mutant|has_variation] -> (n2:SNP) - [r3:associated_with] -> (n3:Phenotype) - [r4:part_of] -> (n4:Trait)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:homoeolog|regulates|genetic|physical] - (:Gene) - [:has_mutant|has_variation] -> (:SNP) - [:associated_with] -> (:Phenotype) - [:part_of] -> (:Trait)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r1:homoeolog|regulates|genetic|physical] - (n1:Gene) - [r2:has_mutant|has_variation] -> (n2:SNP) - [r3:associated_with] -> (n3:Phenotype) - [r4:pub_in] -> (n4:Publication)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:homoeolog|regulates|genetic|physical] - (:Gene) - [:has_mutant|has_variation] -> (:SNP) - [:associated_with] -> (:Phenotype) - [:pub_in] -> (:Publication)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [r1:homoeolog|regulates|genetic|physical] - (n1:Gene) - [r2:has_mutant|has_variation] -> (n2:SNP) - [r3:leads_to] -> (n3:SNPEffect)

RETURN "(:Gene) - [:homoeolog|regulates|genetic|physical] - (:Gene) - [:has_mutant|has_variation] -> (:SNP) - [:leads_to] -> (:SNPEffect)" AS pathway, count

RETURN "(Gene) - [enc] -> (Protein) - [ortho] - (Protein) <- [enc] - (Gene) - [genetic|physical] - (Gene) - [has_variation] -> (SNP) - [associated_with] -> (Phenotype) - [part_of] - (Trait)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (gene_1:Gene) - [enc_1_10_d:enc] -> (protein_10:Protein) - [rel_10_10:ortho] - (protein_10b:Protein) <- [enc_10_9_d:enc] - (gene_9:Gene) - [rel_9_9_2:genetic|physical] - (gene_9b:Gene) - [has_variation_9_20_d:has_variation] -> (sNP_20:SNP) - [associated_with_20_211_d:associated_with] -> (pheno:Phenotype) - [pub_in_211_2_d:pub_in] -> (publication_2:Publication)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(Gene) - [enc] -> (Protein) - [ortho] - (Protein) <- [enc] - (Gene) - [genetic|physical] - (Gene) - [has_variation] -> (SNP) - [associated_with] -> (Phenotype) - [pub_in] -> (Publication)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (gene_1:Gene) - [enc_1_10_d:enc] -> (protein_10:Protein) - [rel_10_10:ortho] - (protein_10b:Protein) <- [enc_10_9_d:enc] - (gene_9:Gene) - [rel_9_9_2:genetic|physical] - (gene_9b:Gene) - [has_variation_9_20_d:has_variation] -> (sNP_20:SNP) - [leads_to_20_26_d:leads_to] -> (sNPEffect_26:SNPEffect)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:enc] -> (:Protein) - [:ortho] - (:Protein) <- [:enc] - (:Gene) - [:genetic|physical] - (:Gene) - [:has_variation] -> (:SNP) - [:leads_to] -> (:SNPEffect)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (gene_1:Gene) - [enc_1_10_d:enc] -> (protein_10:Protein) - [rel_10_10:ortho] - (protein_10b:Protein) <- [enc_10_9_d:enc] - (gene_9:Gene) - [rel_9_9_2:genetic|physical] - (gene_9b:Gene) - [has_observ_pheno_9_13_d:has_observ_pheno] -> (phenotype_13:Phenotype)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:enc] -> (:Protein) - [:ortho] - (:Protein) <- [:enc] - (:Gene) - [:genetic|physical] - (:Gene) - [:has_observ_pheno] -> (:Phenotype)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (gene_1:Gene) - [enc_1_10_d:enc] -> (protein_10:Protein) - [rel_10_10:ortho] - (protein_10b:Protein) <- [enc_10_9_d:enc] - (gene_9:Gene) - [rel_9_9_2:genetic|physical] - (gene_9b:Gene) - [participates_in_9_4_d:participates_in] -> (bioProc_4:BioProc)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:enc] -> (:Protein) - [:ortho] - (:Protein) <- [:enc] - (:Gene) - [:genetic|physical] - (:Gene) - [:participates_in] -> (:BioProc)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (gene_1:Gene) - [enc_1_10_d:enc] -> (protein_10:Protein) - [rel_10_10:ortho] - (protein_10b:Protein) <- [enc_10_9_d:enc] - (gene_9:Gene) - [rel_9_9_2:genetic|physical] - (gene_9b:Gene) - [located_in_9_5_d:located_in] -> (celComp_5:CelComp)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:enc] -> (:Protein) - [:ortho] - (:Protein) <- [:enc] - (:Gene) - [:genetic|physical] - (:Gene) - [:located_in] -> (:CelComp)" AS pathway, count

//caution this is a slow query
UNION ALL
MATCH path = (gene_1:Gene) - [enc_1_10_d:enc] -> (protein_10:Protein) - [rel_10_10:ortho] - (protein_10b:Protein) <- [enc_10_9_d:enc] - (gene_9:Gene) - [rel_9_9_2:genetic|physical] - (gene_9b:Gene) - [pub_in_9_2_d:pub_in] -> (publication_2:Publication)
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN "(:Gene) - [:enc] -> (:Protein) - [:ortho] - (:Protein) <- [:enc] - (:Gene) - [:genetic|physical] - (:Gene) - [:pub_in] -> (:Publication)" AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (gene_1:Gene) - [enc_1_10_d:enc] -> (protein_10:Protein) - [rel_10_10:ortho] - (protein_10b:Protein) <- [enc_10_9_d:enc] - (gene_9:Gene) - [rel_9_9_2:genetic|physical] - (gene_9b:Gene) - [has_function_9_3_d:has_function] -> (molFunc_3:MolFunc)
WITH count(path) AS count

WITH count(path) AS count

reports.title: Choose Gene TAX ID
reports.query:
MATCH (n:`Gene`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`TAXID`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`TAXID` as value ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 5

reports.title: Bioprocess Pathways (starting with the chosen gene TAX ID)
reports.query:
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [:participates_in] -> (:BioProc)
WHERE m.TAXID = $neodash_gene_taxid
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN '(:Gene) - [:participates_in] -> (:BioProc)' AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [:part_of] -> (:CoExpCluster) - [:enriched_for] -> (:BioProc)
WHERE m.TAXID = $neodash_gene_taxid
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN '(:Gene) - [:part_of] -> (:CoExpCluster) - [:enriched_for] -> (:BioProc)' AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [:differentially_expressed] -> (:DGES) - [:enriched_for] -> (:BioProc)
WHERE m.TAXID = $neodash_gene_taxid
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN '(:Gene) - [:differentially_expressed] -> (:DGES) - [:enriched_for] -> (:BioProc)' AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [:homoeolog] - (:Gene) - [:participates_in] -> (:BioProc)
WHERE m.TAXID = $neodash_gene_taxid
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN '(:Gene) - [:homoeolog] - (:Gene) - [:participates_in] -> (:BioProc)' AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [:regulates|genetic|physical] - (:Gene) - [:participates_in] -> (:BioProc)

WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN '(:Gene) - [:regulates|genetic|physical] - (:Gene) - [:participates_in] -> (:BioProc)' AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [:enc] -> (:Protein) - [:h_s_s|ortho|xref*0..1] - (:Protein) - [:participates_in] -> (:BioProc)
WHERE m.TAXID = $neodash_gene_taxid
WITH count(path) AS count
RETURN '(:Gene) - [:enc] -> (:Protein) - [:h_s_s|ortho|xref*0..1] - (:Protein) - [:participates_in] -> (:BioProc)' AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [:enc] -> (:Protein) - [:h_s_s|ortho|xref*0..1] - (:Protein) - [:has_domain] -> (:ProtDomain) - [:participates_in] -> (:BioProc)
WHERE m.TAXID = $neodash_gene_taxid

RETURN '(:Gene) - [:enc] -> (:Protein) - [:h_s_s|ortho|xref*0..1] - (:Protein) - [:has_domain] -> (:ProtDomain) - [:participates_in] -> (:BioProc)' AS pathway, count

UNION ALL

RETURN '(:Gene) - [:enc] -> (:Protein) - [:ortho] - (:Protein) <- [:enc] - (:Gene) - [:participates_in] -> (:BioProc)' AS pathway, count

UNION ALL
MATCH path = (m:Gene) - [:enc] -> (:Protein) - [:ortho] - (:Protein) <- [:enc] - (:Gene) - [:genetic|physical] - (:Gene) - [:participates_in] -> (:BioProc)
WHERE m.TAXID = $neodash_gene_taxid
